DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test a web-based video game to help cancer patients quit smoking. The investigators are interested in what participants like and do not like about the game.
DOC.brief_title: Quit IT: Development of a Web-based, 3D Coping Skills Game to Increase Self-Efficacy for Maintaining Smoking Abstinence Following Hospitalization
DOC.criteria: Treated by the MSKCC Tobacco Cessation Program At least 30 years of age Insufficient manual dexterity and vision to use a computer and mouse as per selfreport Unstable medical or psychiatric condition as determined by the PI and CoPI.
